abstract: British lawmakers will debate rival petitions prompted by Republican presidential candidate Donald J Trump's call to ban Muslims from entering United States; petition to bar Trump from Britain is signed by more than 500,000 people while petition saying he should not be barred is signed by nearly 40,000.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Britain: Parliament to Debate Closing Border to Trump
headline.main: Britain: Parliament to Debate Closing Border to Trump

snippet: British lawmakers will debate a petition that calls for the Republican presidential candidate Donald J. Trump to be barred from Britain.
lead_paragraph: British lawmakers will debate a petition that calls for the Republican presidential candidate Donald J. Trump to be barred from Britain.
